No. 38, No. 39,

Misc.

Misc.

Richter v. United States; and Cannon v. United States. A. L. Wirin and Fred Okrand for petitioners. Solicitor General Perlman, Assistant Attorney General Mclnerney, Philip R. Monahan and Robert G. Maysack for the United States.

C. A. 9th Cir. Certiorari denied.

Reported below: 181 F. 2d 354, 591.
